question: What sources were used when filming 'AI Ethics & Society'?
sql_query1: SELECT name, specialty FROM Experts JOIN Documentary ON Documentary.EXPERT_ID = Experts.id WHERE title = 'AI Ethics & Society'
sql_query2: SELECT description, source FROM Archival_Footage JOIN Documentary ON Documentary.Archive_Footage_ID = Archival_Footage.id WHERE title = 'AI Ethics & Society'
sql_query3: SELECT name, specialty,  description, source FROM Experts JOIN Documentary ON Documentary.EXPERT_ID = Experts.id JOIN Archival_Footage ON Documentary.Archive_Footage_ID = Archival_Footage.id  WHERE title = 'AI Ethics & Society'
interpretation1: What experts were consulted when filming 'AI Ethics & Society'?
interpretation2: What archival footage is there of 'AI Ethics & Society'?
interpretation3: What experts and archival footage were used when filming 'AI Ethics & Society'?
sql_query_general: SELECT name, specialty FROM Consulted_Sources JOIN Documentary ON Documentary.EXPERT_ID = Consulted_Sources.id WHERE title = 'AI Ethics & Society'

question: What sources were used when filming 'The Future of Work'?
sql_query1: SELECT name, specialty FROM Experts JOIN Documentary ON Documentary.EXPERT_ID = Experts.id WHERE title = 'The Future of Work'
sql_query2: SELECT description, source FROM Archival_Footage JOIN Documentary ON Documentary.Archive_Footage_ID = Archival_Footage.id WHERE title = 'The Future of Work'

interpretation1: What experts were used when filming 'The Future of Work'?
interpretation2: What archival footage was used when filming 'The Future of Work'?
interpretation3: What experts and archival footages were used when filming 'The Future of Work'?
